Question.Subject: How can I convert pdf to powerpoint or word?
Question.ChosenAnswer: You may download this PDF to Word Converter for a try, I always use it to convert pdf file to microsoft word doc file, my friends recommend it to me, it's safe and works pretty well for me. It supports encrypted PDF file. http://www.pdftoworddoc.com Hope it helps. Contact me if you have any other question or use http://www.ask.com to search more answers.
